summary: A saboteur posing as a scientist strives to destroy the world's first space station.
cast: Donna Martell|Hayden Rorke|Ross Ford|Larry Johns|Herb Jacobs|Barbara Morrison|Ernestine Barrier|James Craven|John Hedloe|Peter Adams|Robert Karnes|John Straub|Charles Keane|John Tomecko|Robert Paltz
title: Project Moon Base
